title: 惊了我不能回复别人
author: IceFairyCirno
txt_content:
var v='b7a4e42fbb0dae62348da1126b7e8bfb'; document.cookie='ccdefend='+v+'; path=/'; window.location.reload();
很迷这个东西

replies.author: AzureZeng
replies.txt_content:
论坛前几天被DDOC(DDOS)了
出了问题
已经修复 只不过还要等全国CDN刷新才行

replies.author: 有毒○贰比
replies.txt_content: 右键回复，点击新标签页就可以回复了~

replies.author: 尘
replies.txt_content: 我也是，评分也出现这个。。。

replies.author: efsg_
replies.txt_content: 服务器问题，最近论坛不太稳

replies.txt_content: 没有遇到任何问题的我

replies.author: Mr_kiss
replies.txt_content: 验证问题真的难，填对了也错

replies.author: IceFairyCirno
replies.txt_content:

右键回复，点击新标签页就可以回复了~
